attributes.additional_details:
Forty years of wrong dietary advice have led to a massive increase in diet related disease(obesity,heart disease, diabetes, hypertension); costing the taxpayer billions.

The present advice is for a higher carbohydrate diet, low in saturated fat.

There is an ever increasing body of evidence that suggests a higher fat, lower carbohydrate diet can curb this trend.

There should be a complete independent review of the present dietary advice. The review should be conducted by experts who are not employed by any food or drug companies. No research funded by food and drug companies should be included in the review.
